${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:CoinGlare.NAME: Coin Glare
${modID}:CoinGlare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Costs 5 Gold to play.
${modID}:CoinGlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Costs 5 Gold to play.

${modID}:Slash.NAME: Slash
${modID}:Slash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain ${modID}:Fool's_Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Dive.NAME: Dive
${modID}:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Strength at the end of the turn.

${modID}:PocketChange.NAME: Pocket Change
${modID}:PocketChange.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Lose Gold equal to damage blocked this turn.

${modID}:Donation.NAME: Donation
${modID}:Donation.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. NL At the end of combat, gain double the Gold lost from this card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Donation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold twice. NL At the end of combat, gain double the Gold lost from this card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CoinToss.NAME: Coin Toss
${modID}:CoinToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Gold.

${modID}:TalonSlash.NAME: Talon Slash
${modID}:TalonSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to an enemy X times.
${modID}:TalonSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+1 damage to an enemy X+1 times.

${modID}:BidingTime.NAME: Biding Time
${modID}:BidingTime.DESCRIPTION: In !M! turns, gain 1 Ritual. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Molting.NAME: Molting
${modID}:Molting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Rake.NAME: Rake
${modID}:Rake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Each enemy after the first takes !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Skygaze.NAME: Skygaze
${modID}:Skygaze.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! card and gain [E] .
${modID}:Skygaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards and gain [E] .

${modID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${modID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Strength affects Block gained.

${modID}:Caw.NAME: Caw!
${modID}:Caw.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL End your turn.

${modID}:SpringDaggers.NAME: Spring Daggers
${modID}:SpringDaggers.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Poke.NAME: Poke
${modID}:Poke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain ${modID}:Urge, move this card to your hand.

${modID}:GutFeeling.NAME: Gut Feeling
${modID}:GutFeeling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] next turn. NL Gain [E] [E] in 2 turns.

${modID}:Screech.NAME: Screech
${modID}:Screech.DESCRIPTION: Turn all your Ritual into double that amount in Strength. NL Your next attack is played twice.

${modID}:Peck.NAME: Peck
${modID}:Peck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength.

${modID}:GoldenWall.NAME: Golden Wall
${modID}:GoldenWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each 50 Gold held.

${modID}:BirdsEye.NAME: Bird's Eye
${modID}:BirdsEye.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Gold, gain !M! additional Gold.

${modID}:TruthSeek.NAME: Truth Seek
${modID}:TruthSeek.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:MoltenGold.NAME: Molten Gold
${modID}:MoltenGold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each 50 Gold held.

${modID}:MoneyRain.NAME: Money Rain
${modID}:MoneyRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every 50 Gold held. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StockBubble.NAME: Stock Bubble
${modID}:StockBubble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Fool's_Gold. NL Reduce this value by 10 when played this combat.

${modID}:Hatch.NAME: Hatch
${modID}:Hatch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Urge. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fluff.NAME: Fluff
${modID}:Fluff.DESCRIPTION: When gaining or losing Strength, gain or lose 1 Dexterity.
${modID}:Fluff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When gaining or losing Strength, gain or lose 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:PushOn.NAME: Push On
${modID}:PushOn.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. Next turn, start with !M! [E] . NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Circle.NAME: Circle
${modID}:Circle.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. Next turn, you cannot play Attacks. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Brainwash.NAME: Brainwash
${modID}:Brainwash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and lower the Strength of the enemy hit by 1 for every following attack that hits this enemy this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BreakTime.NAME: Break Time
${modID}:BreakTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, you cannot play Attacks, but your first card is played twice.
${modID}:BreakTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, you cannot play Attacks, but your first !M! cards are played twice.

${modID}:CultRules.NAME: Cult Rules
${modID}:CultRules.DESCRIPTION: Double a random debuff on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CultRules.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double all debuffs on ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CrescentSlash.NAME: Crescent Slash
${modID}:CrescentSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Skill in hand.

${modID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${modID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Play the next Attack twice. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Play the next Attack twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PoundOfFeathers.NAME: Pound of Feathers
${modID}:PoundOfFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the damage your next Attack deals. Exhaust.
${modID}:PoundOfFeathers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the damage your next Attack deals.

${modID}:Procrastinate.NAME: Procrastinate
${modID}:Procrastinate.DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! Strength from ALL enemies. ALL enemies gain 6 Strength in X turns.
${modID}:Procrastinate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! Strength from ALL enemies. ALL enemies gain 6 Strength in X+1 turns.

${modID}:Swoop.NAME: Swoop
${modID}:Swoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block !M! times.

${modID}:SecondRound.NAME: Second Round
${modID}:SecondRound.DESCRIPTION: When killing a non-minion enemy, return the last Exhausted card that turn to your hand.
${modID}:SecondRound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When killing a non-minion enemy, return all Exhausted cards that turn to your hand.

${modID}:Nap.NAME: Nap
${modID}:Nap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and end your turn. NL Next turn, gain [E] .

${modID}:DreamForever.NAME: Dream Forever
${modID}:DreamForever.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. Generate !M! less [E] at the start of your turn.

${modID}:SunBathe.NAME: Sun Bathe
${modID}:SunBathe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Reoccurrence.NAME: Reoccurrence
${modID}:Reoccurrence.DESCRIPTION: Move all cards in hand to draw pile and end your turn.
${modID}:Reoccurrence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Move all cards in hand to draw pile and end your turn. NL Next turn, draw !M! extra card.

${modID}:Reunion.NAME: Reunion
${modID}:Reunion.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL EVERYONE loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Betray.NAME: Betray
${modID}:Betray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for every stack of negative Strength on the enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Insurance.NAME: Insurance
${modID}:Insurance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Gold, draw !M! card.
${modID}:Insurance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Gold, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Bargaining.NAME: Bargaining
${modID}:Bargaining.DESCRIPTION: All cards can be played regardless of restrictions at the cost of !M! *Gold.

${modID}:GunsAreButters.NAME: Guns Are Butters
${modID}:GunsAreButters.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Gold, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${modID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this enemy is killed, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Untouchable.NAME: Untouchable
${modID}:Untouchable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible next turn. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Culling.NAME: Culling
${modID}:Culling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double damage for each unique debuff on the enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Nevermore.NAME: Nevermore
${modID}:Nevermore.DESCRIPTION: Store unblocked damage as long as you have ${modID}:Urge and lose it as health when losing all ${modID}:Urge. NL Lose 1 ${modID}:Urge at the end of your turn.

${modID}:AscendedForm.NAME: Ascended Form
${modID}:AscendedForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Ritual.

${modID}:ChocolateGold.NAME: Chocolate Gold
${modID}:ChocolateGold.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. NL Heal 10 HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CurseOut.NAME: Curse Out
${modID}:CurseOut.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Preening.NAME: Preening
${modID}:Preening.DESCRIPTION: While Transformed, you no longer lose ${modID}:Urge.
